Axis & Allies, on my cell phone! What more can I say? A&A was one of my favorite board games, growing up, and now it's easily accessible on my cell phone. I've already played 4 campaigns, and this game is great! No more need to hall out the board game and needlessly set up plastic pieces, anymore. Now, I can play a quick, or long game without the need for setup, and can enjoy the single player experience I've always had with the game, since I could never find anyone to play the board game with.  Controls are a little difficult, as there are so many pieces on the board, but you can quickly zoom in and double tap to select the units you want to select.  Gameplay is fast and fierce and I sometimes find the A.I. using very smart, and tactical moves.   Graphics remind me of the exact layout of the original hoard game, including the detailed pieces of each faction's land, air, and sea units.  If you're unfamiliar with how AA plays, there's a tutorial section included in the game.   Overall, if you're even a slight AA fan, this game deserves it's collection on your phone. It's a shame Hasbro, or whomever produces the board game hasn't gotten into this, as this is a fantastic remake.  Now, if the developer can make the D-Day and Pacific expansion packs, this would be the definitive version.  Thanks for your work, lone ranger!
